type: Legendary Creature – Human Warlock Knight Noble
rules_text:
Menace
[i]Brynhildr[/i] – Whenever Leo, Sorcerous Prince attacks, target opponent mills three cards.
[i]Pragmatic[/i] – Whenever a creature card is put into an opponents graveyard from anywhere, that player loses 1 life. If you control another Warlock, that player loses 2 life instead.
